result.arabic_text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
result.translation: 43. Or have they an ilâh (a god) other than Allâh? Glorified be Allâh from all that they ascribe as partners (to Him)[1]
result.footnotes:
(V.52:43)
a) See the footnote (B) of (V.3:130).
b) See the footnote of (V.2:278)
